mewbot.tools.test module¶

class mewbot.tools.test.TestToolchain(*folders: str, in_ci: bool)¶

Bases: ToolChain

build_pytest_args() → List[str]¶

Builds out the pytest command

This varies based on what output types are requested (human vs code readable), and whether coverage is enabled. Due to issues with pytest-cov handling, parallelisation is disabled when coverage is enabled https://github.com/nedbat/coveragepy/issues/1303#issuecomment-1014915146

coverage: bool = False¶
run() → Generator[Annotation, None, None]¶

Abstract function for this tool chain to run its checks

mewbot.tools.test.parse_options() → Namespace¶
